name: Smash the Mall - Instant Stress Fix!
name_original: Smash the Mall - Instant Stress Fix!
description:
From the creators of Smash the Office!

Checkout clerk dream come true!
Are you ready to smash stuff!?

1. Smash the Mall with guerrilla weapons!
2. Earn upgrades: weapons, rooms, outfits!
3. Relieve your stress!

Play the dream!
